name: Multicross Blitz
description:
Tetris® creator Alexey Pajitnov comes out with MultiCross Blitz! - а new puzzle game.

Designer of Tetris® adds another dimension to his creation.

• Form a full line of blocks either horizontally or vertically to score and remove it up from the field.
• Building crossing lines cleans out the entire field and creates a Star in the intersection.
• Fill the whole field with Stars for huge Stargazer bonus.

It’s time to drop in for a challenge in the newest creation of puzzle guru Alexey Pajitnov.
